price: 31. Xagga Fircoon ah; wuxuu ahaa islaweyne, ka mid ahaa xadgudbayaasha.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
